snippet.title: Half-Life 2: Aftermath - Blind Playthrough with commentary of some maps.
snippet.description:
Watch me, Phillip, playthrough some of the maps from the Half-Life 2: Aftermath Release 1 mappack.

 It is not meant to be an extensive playthrough of all the maps.

Full details, including in-depth reviews, HD screenshots, panoramics and a fast, direct download link can be found here:
http://www.runthinkshootlive.com/posts/half-life-2-aftermath/

══════════════════════════════════
If you like what I am doing, please support me on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/planetphillip

Alternatively you can make a single donation via PayPal to:
planetphillip@gmail.com

══════════════════════════════════
RUN. THINK. SHOOT. LIVE.
RunThinkShootLive.com lists and reviews single player maps and mods for the Half-Life series of games.
In addition the site also generates related content, including various types of podcasts and articles.

══════════════════════════════════
SUBSCRIBE:
Subscribe to the RTSL YouTube channel to see map & mods reviews, previews, walkthroughs, playthroughs, special features and tips & tricks.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdywmbbZT-qRYrJeWP3WHhA?sub_confirmation=1

══════════════════════════════════
FOLLOW RTSL:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/planetphillip
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/planetphillip
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/planetphillip

══════════════════════════════════
